discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: @CohenCyril Do you plan to have orthogonal complementation of vector subspaces here?

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
> @CohenCyril Do you plan to have orthogonal complementation of vector subspaces here?

There is at matrix level, and everything should be lifted to vector spaces. So yes.

tags.description: Issue or PR about addition of features.
PR that needs to be developed further.

commits.author: CohenCyril
commits.message:
Initial Import of spectral theorem and bilinear forms

- Adding bilinear, sesquilinear, hermitian (symmetric, skew symmetric and hermitian) to mathcomp
- Fixing a proof of the spectral theorem accordingly
- Need to document
- Need to backport several theorems to matrix, vector or mxalgebra
- Need to bridge vector and mxalgebra to port results
